analysis.key_quote: Civil service must be non-partisan. Not only is that in the best interest of our fellow Americans, it is also in the interest of agencies being able to attract and retain the most qualified and skilled individuals to complete these critical jobs.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposal by emphasizing the importance of a non-partisan civil service and the need to retain qualified individuals, which aligns with concerns about politicization and the merit-based system.
